rows.label: qev085502_MSG0001
rows.name:
It's no use... My weapons just don't pack enough punch.
I need better gear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085502_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev085502_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell him his little pea-shooter is useless.

rows.label: qev085502_JNK0020
rows.name: Press

rows.label: qev085502_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask if he really thinks it's the weapon's fault.

rows.label: qev085502_MSG0002
rows.name: Right? Right?! Forget defense, the best offense is a huge gun![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085502_MSG0003
rows.name: You really think so?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085502_MSG0004
rows.name: Uh, don't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085502_MSG0005
rows.name:
Well, yeah. Stronger weapons make stronger soldiers.
It's just math.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085502_MSG0006
rows.name: It's just wrong is what it is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085502_MSG0007
rows.name: Hm? How do you mean?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085502_MSG0008
rows.name: Lin? What are your thoughts on what we just saw?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085502_MSG0009
rows.name: Well...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085502_MSG0010
rows.name: No, be honest. Please.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085502_MSG0011
rows.name:
Okay, well, it sort of felt like your weapons were
using you instead of the other way around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085502_MSG0012
rows.name: They were using me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085502_MSG0013
rows.name:
Yeah. Don't take this the wrong way,
but we mechanics have a little saying:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085502_MSG0014
rows.name:
Even the fanciest, most high-tech tools
are useless in the hands of an amateur.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085502_MSG0015
rows.name: I think that sums it up perfectly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085502_MSG0016
rows.name:
You don't need a more powerful weaponâ€”
you just need more skill handling them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085502_MSG0017
rows.name:
Without the fundamentals in place,
even a magical wonder gun would be wasted on you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085502_MSG0018
rows.name: Start with the basics, huh? I never thought of that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085502_MSG0019
rows.name: We'll begin with some simple drills.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085502_MSG0020
rows.name: Hold on a second. I have the perfect tool for this...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085502_MSG0021
rows.name: Ma'am, yes ma'am! Thank you, ma'am![ST:wait ]
